title: How did Greeks, Romans and other Mediterraneans describe Germanic tribes? - Quora

response.answer_text: Greco-Romans loved Blonde hair and Red hair was sold with a very high price at Rome and they thought that Germanics were beautiful , tall like giants and with inhuman strength with fierce blue eyes and blonde and redheads while peoples like North Africans thought of them very badly like wild monkeys because of the Vandal and Viking invasions but other peoples like arabs thought of them like perfect physical specimens, tall as date palms, blond and ruddy.
